text:
We are USA-UES | ONSITE | Los Angeles, CA | Full-time (unable to sponsor at this time) | IT/DevOps, Software Engineering/Architects

Our focus is coaching kids to get in and succeed at college.

We are looking for people to join us, who share our vision to guide students towards higher education, and who want to grow with a company opening a huge market.

Are you experienced, technical, capable, accountable, a natural leader? Want to make a huge impact on education levering technology? Let's talk!

https://usaues.bamboohr.com/jobs/
